translation: All the sages have thus declared Thee, as also the divine sage Narada; so also Asita, Devala, and Vyasa; and now Thou Thyself dost say so to me.
commentary: 10.13 They say (they) declared? You Thee? Rishis the Rishis? All all? Devarshi: Devarshi? Narada: Narada? And also? Asita: Asita? Devala: Devala? Vyasa: Vyasa? Thyself? f and? Eve even? Bravishi (Thou) sayest? me to me.Commentary Rishi is a holy sage of disciplined mind and senses.Devarshi A divine sage more highly evolved than a Rishi.
